HackTheBox - Hacking Mirai

10 Feb 2018
  • hackthebox
  • ctf

HackTheBox was the first CTF site that I actually played with. Hacking Mirai was great, using previous knowledge, getting to learn new stuff. It felt awesome when the root hash was accepted. I hope you have fun reading.
